Subject: Relocation
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=89630313
X-Yahoo-Profile: dph_of_rules

In a couple of weeks, I plan on renaming this group and changing the 
name of my group , new-gladiator , to this name.  The main reason for 
this is to allow me to appoint extra moderators to fill in as well as 
give myself a back-up moderator account for this discussion area in 
case something happens to my moderator account.  There will be no 
differences and the name change should make it easy to move on.
